Package eddy.lang.analysis

Provides classes to perform Eddy policy analysis.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Analytics
    Provides utility functions for querying a Compilation object.
    CompilationProfile
    Computes a set of statistics from the Compilation.
    Conflict
    Describes a conflict between two rules.
    ConflictAnalyzer
    Analyzes a Compilation for conflicts between policy rules.
    CrossFlowGrapher
    Exports the flows within and across policies in GraphML.
    CrossFlowTracer
    Find all data flows across two or more Policy objects.
    CrossFlowTracer.CrossFlow
    Describes a Flow between two Policy objects.
    ExtendedConflictAnalyzer
    Extends the ConflictAnalyzer to multi-threaded analysis.
    Extension
    Describes the itemized Action interpretations for all Rule in a Policy.
    ExtensionCalculator
    Computes the Extension from a Policy.
    FlowTracer
    Traces data flows in a Policy from source to target Action.
    LimitationPrinciple
    Applies the limitation principle across two actions.
    ThesaurusExtractor
    Extracts all RoleValue names from a given policy.
    Tracer
    Traces a Tracer.Flow between two RoleValue objects.
    Tracer.Flow
    Describes a flow between two Rule objects.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Conflict.Type
    Describes the type of conflict.
    Tracer.Flow.Mode
    Describes the kind of flow between two RoleValue objects.

Package eddy.lang.analysis Description

Provides classes to perform Eddy policy analysis.
